website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Ultraboost Parley was welcomed by many runners. They liked its comfortable construction, its appealing looks, and its agreeable performance. Moreover, the use of recycled materials for the upper resonated well with environment-conscious individuals. Conversely, some people noted that it was initially tight while others lamented the high price.
pros: The color schemes available for the Adidas Ultraboost Parley were lauded by many for being appealing and stylish
This running shoe looked better in real-life than its photographic representations, according to most testers
Several people noted that the materials used in this shoe were of premium quality
The underfoot cushioning system felt very comfortable, based on general user feedback
Most runners noted that the width-profile was automatically agreeable
The environmental-friendly construction of the upper unit was genuinely appreciated by many consumers
Some purchasers observed that the durability was top-notch
cons: According to a few purchasers, the fabric on the upper was tight
it needed a break-in period of several uses
The price for a pair of the Ultraboost Parley was considered by many to be expensive

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real uncomfortable- too tight real hard to get your foot into. If you have a wide foot these will kill your feet. Not available in size E
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Laces are a bit short
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, love the fit. Pretty true to size. I have wider feet and I wear a 10.5 and they’re comfortable. Went on a 3 mile run 2 days into wearing the shoes and they felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Paid For New Shoes and Got Used Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe box came heavily damaged (basically crushed) and the shoes had scuff marks on the heel cup and showed signs of wear. I paid for new shoes. Be cautious buying. 2/5/19 *UPDATE* Contacted seller and seller quickly assessed the situation and made it right, thank you. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable fashion shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore a different brand for many years, but, the last few releases disappointed me which led me to look for a new shoe. I really liked the idea of the Parely for the Ocean concept and wanted to try these. I must wear a stability shoe. The arch felt a little odd for a moment, but, after a week or so of wearing I love these. I had tried the regular Adidas Ultraboost and they had terrible support, but, the ST provide good support. I struggle considering these a serious running shoe and they are WAY OVER PRICED; so, for that they get 4 starts versus 5.
customer_reviews.author: Anynomous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: now I am so happy I found this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I run 6miles a day. Everyday. I wear this shoes for 2 months now but I am free from back and knee pain. I use to run 4miles a day with Nike Freerun and I suffered from knee pain. now I am so happy I found this shoes. highly recommend for marathoners.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cho

customer_reviews.title: Really like these shoes, great for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they were listed on the Adidas site as shoes for flat feet. They provide great support and my feet feel "relieved" after being in them for a while. Overall a very good shoe and if you are looking for shoes with good support for flat feet, I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, I have worn Nike and several other brands, but NO SHOE fits as comfortable as these do! I recently walked all the steps of the Acropolis and Parthenon in Greece, as well as cobble stone roads and these shoes actually made my feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Victor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, beautiful designed Adidas Parley
customer_reviews.text: Though I bought the Men's shoe size 8.5 (I take a 10), they fit perfectly on me (I am a woman). The woman's shoe wasn't as attractive to me. My only issue was the price which I found very steep, and the fact that the shoe tongue is stationary; doesn't move & isn't a separate piece. This is just a bit weird. Overall I love the shoes; very comfortable, lightweight and not hot. I use them for walking, not running.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Feigert

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes I’ve Ever Worn
customer_reviews.text: Walking in these shoes feels like I’m walking on clouds! They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned! I have this particular one in two colors now and then also bought the water resistant version for when I’m walking in the rain. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: buy ‘em, and buy ‘em now, all the hype about boost is true, I did not believe what everyone said, but I do now. Must comfortable sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The Almighty Ultraboost 👂
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to try on the allmighty ultraboost that is so heavily and praised...I wasn't too impressed as a casual shoe person. It's not that squishy, but yeah it's alright. If you are looking for comfort, look towards Hoka's One One brand shoes, most of their shoes are the definition of marshmallow cushioning. Performance wise, they seem to be decently built shoes too. I wouldn't pay MSRP for them, but on sale sure. I returned my pair as they did not live up to the hype. Not casual enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ni N

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a super serious runner, but I do love the Ultraboost shoes. They fit a little tighter than I anticipated, but I don't know that would have dissuaded me if I were trying them on in a store. They're durable and they look good. Overall, it's the most comfortable and lightest shoe I've ever owned. And I got a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: mike keil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable like marshmallows, and look amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of shoes I've ever had. Comfy, super comfy, oh and also really very comfortable; not to mention they look amazing. I was skeptical of the durability of the ultraboosts due to the canvas (ish, it's really very high quality) top, but they've held up wearing them all the time for 3 months now: work, running, and casual. Can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best shoe and the best Adidas Ultraboost
customer_reviews.text: A++ No complains i went to Eurotrip , its durable , comfortable and cozy to walk ,run , jog , jump, dance, standing on line , etc i buy it again cuz im 9.5 and its amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little big, but I’ve had for over a year and still wear them. I wash them in the washing machine and air dry outside or by fans and they are amazing. Had to replace the inserts but that’s as expected!
customer_reviews.author: MFJR

customer_reviews.title: comfort at a new level
customer_reviews.text: nothing has come close to the fit of this Ultraboost. Adidas has reached a new level with this shoe. It looks good and hard to know that it is there at all.
customer_reviews.author: budgie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, comfortable and feel like walking on air! Use them for walking and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: Small in the Toes
customer_reviews.text: This was a very comfortable shoe, but for me they were too small in the toes and after a while it became uncomfortable. I returned them at Kohl's and used the return money to buy a couple different pairs. If you have small toes(?), then you should be fine. My feet are also wide and flat if that helps (size 12 mens).
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I am a fan of New Balance shoes, but recently the tread has been coming off on my last 2 pairs. These Adidas shoes have great soles/tread and crazy comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GFar

customer_reviews.title: Use it for what these are made.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty comfortable, I like the way that the cushion adapts to my feet, but, when I use this for a long time (4-5 hours) the upper part starts to hurt so I gotta take it off, however, when I put them again these are way over more comfortable than my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a pair of comfortable shoes and this ones really did it for me
customer_reviews.author: GerardoHirlemann

customer_reviews.title: Best show in the world for people with achilles issues
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can’t tell you are wearing water bottles in your feet :)
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro I. Lavie

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my heel pain while running!
customer_reviews.text: If you have any kind of pain in your legs or feet while running, I definitely recommend these shoes. Plus they look good so you can flex on those haters
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awesome for the gym- very comfortable and good sole support
customer_reviews.author: John Kostro

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my son, hea happy with the look and size.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E. Dieterle

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable running shoes I’ve ever had. It is like walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eco-friendly Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pair of running shoes. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: roverus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable and very stylish. Highly recommend UltraBoosts and Adidas shoes in general.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is smaller than expected based on description
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of the shoes. Delivery was easy and convenient. I am just a little disappointed with how they fit. I would love to find out the process for return/exchange for a new size.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love them, look great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes somewhat small, but will probably get looser in a few days. Love Adidas
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Webb

customer_reviews.title: Not all white
customer_reviews.text: Not completely white. Shoe has some blue/grey all around it. Not a bad look just not what I expected from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Best running shoes I have ever wore. I am 200 lbs and running makes my knees hurt but not with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: They feel tight at first, but after wearing them a couple times, it’s like wearing clouds on your feet!!! Awesome shoes, love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: marco campos

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They fit great, have good heel support (I have plantar fasciitis in my left heel), and are nice looking shoes. I've gotten several compliments on them. Arguably the best athletic shoes I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Young

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, not well made
customer_reviews.text: I have to update this review unfortunately. After just a few weeks and light use a huge hole has developed in the back heel of my left shoe for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm size a size 9. With the ultraboost, size 9 is too tight aeound the toe box and size 9.5 is too big in general. Highly disappointed, would not recommend for sports or running or work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking colorway. People are not over-hyping when they say ultraboost are the most comfortable shoe out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eco-style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and style and being made of recycled materials makes them even better
customer_reviews.author: T. Manteau

customer_reviews.title: Love the cloth feel and flexible bend of the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good shoe as far the comfort and flexibility with everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The interior box was completely destroyed, and the outside packaging box was fine. Not happy about this as it’s a gift.
customer_reviews.author: twoluckykids

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, colors on screen were similar to in person. Prompt service as well, I received my purchase one day faster than estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I wear these all the time! So comfortable and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: So comfy! but size up!
customer_reviews.text: Runs down but if you size up it is perfect. I bought it as a gift and they loved them! They are so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Huang

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ultra boosts!! The fit was true and the shoes are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - disappointed that they were previously worn
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son after loving several other pair we have purchased. Disappointed that these shoes showed signs of wear on one sole and tags had obviously been taken off and tied back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, he absolutely loves them. The fit is perfect, plus he says they are very comfortable. These are his favorite brand of shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ringo

customer_reviews.title: Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the shoes and received them and my son loves them. These shoes perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. So comfortable and Sustainable. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Max Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They fit nicely and are extremely comfortable, 10 out of 10 would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Micah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Bad materials : that are difficult to clean the "bottom". Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: salem

customer_reviews.title: Crazy comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable work shoes I’ve had in 8 yrs as a nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Charles

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is the most comfortable pair of sneakers that I own
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, I use it for cross country and it hasn’t let me down yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda narrow
customer_reviews.text: Good length but squeezes my foot, should have gotten wide size
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thairone

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, run a little small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, just a tad on the small side. I have a pair of pureboost’s that are a little more roomy
customer_reviews.author: Colin Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Give them time to break in
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable shoes. The upper is tight when new, give it time to break in. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Boudreaux

product_meta.title: adidas Ultraboost Parley, Men’s Ultraboost Parley
product_meta.description: Get that best-ever feeling on every run. Designed for long city runs, these neutral shoes have a breathable knit upper that's made with yarn spun from recycled plastic. Energy-returning cushioning and a flexible outsole work together to give you a smooth ride from touch-down to toe-off. Engineered fit adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot with an engineered fit for targeted support that enhances movement Endless energy Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever, delivering incredible energy return: The more energy you give, the more you get Good for the oceans This product is created with yarn made in collaboration with Parley for the Oceans. Some of the yarn features Parley Ocean Plastic which is made from recycled waste, intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean
feature_bullets: Flexible Stretchweb outsole; Continental Rubber outsole for extraordinary traction in wet and dry conditions; Midfoot cage
Responsive Boost midsole; Stabilising Torsion System
